mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERSHIP_ID, MEMBERSHIP_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(MEMBERSHIP_INDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') as MEMBERSHIP_INDATE, TO_CHAR(MEMBERSHIP_OUTDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')as MEMBERSHIP_OUTDATE, MEMBERSHIP_PRICE FROM MEMBERSHIP_TB WHERE MEMBERSHIP_USER_ID= #{membership_user_id}
